title: Joseon Night Novel
alternative_title: Joseon Erotica ; Joseon Night Novel ; 조선야설
status: Joseon Erotica ; Joseon Night Novel ; 조선야설
description:
Description :
        Joseon Night Novel ,  at manhwawebsiteThe only woman in Gyeongdeok Bookstore, Musim'She had another job,and that was the best novelist in Joseon, Geobong Daesa.As usual, while Musim was planning a new work, she accidentally met a man and touched and felt his strong body, which inspired her novel,and gave birth to her masterpiece, Ssanghwajeom'.As expected, Ssanghwajeom became the talk of the town as soon as it was released, and there was no one who didn't know about itOne day, Hyehwa' from Yeongwolgak, the best gisaeng house in Hanyang, suddenly came to visit her as she was on a roll.Hyehwa asked Musim to write the story she wantedMaybe you like !
